pkgmetadata.longdescription: ##YQL[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/plasmashadow/yql.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/plasmashadow/yql)[![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/yql.svg)](http://badge.fury.io/py/yql)##Description:YQL is a thin wrapper for Yahoo Query Language.##Installation:```python pip install yql```##UsageInorder to create a yahoo request you can use a YRequest call from YQL.```pythonfrom yql import YRequestimport logginglog = logging.getLogger(__name__)y = YRequest(table="html")y.add_filter("url", "http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Yahoo")response = y.json()log.info(response)```Since yql comes with the Object mapper you can directly reference thesub keys of a json.```pythonlog.info(response.query.count)```##LICENSEMIT
